long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is build to help identify Objects on a web page.  You can easily identify an object's finder properties by just activating the extension in the extension bar and then click on the object.  It should provide you with ID, Class and other identifiable information about the object that then can be entered in AutoWeb script manager.
